msbt.message: I got somethin' for you. Check it.I found an extra DIY recipe for a Bunny Day crown while I was lookin' for my . You want it?
Still wish I knew where my got toAnyway, can't wait to see what you do with that recipe, !
Wait a sec. Your pockets are full. Hey, my isn't in your pockets by any chance, is it?Nah, 'course not. Alright, well, you go clear some pocket space and I'll keep lookin' for my .
You never know what you're gonna find cleanin'Here, do you want a DIY recipe for a Bunny Day bag? I already have one. Yours for the low price of nothin'.
You're gonna rock that recipe. I can already tell, .
Oh! Your pockets are full. OK, so the recipe's gonna cost you some pocket space, .Now go get rid of somethin' so I can give you this recipe!
I am ROCKING this year's egg hunt. It's nuts. I've found so many eggs I don't even know what to do with 'em.You know what? Here! Take 5 of my . Free.
There! Eat 'em, or craft with 'em, or throw 'em in the ocean. I don't care. They're all yours now, !
Oh, come on! How am I supposed to give you free stuff if you're walking around with full pockets?!Go clear some space, OK? I'll just be hanging out here feeling generous.
